needs: Kehinde seeks to design and implement curricula that clearly align with standards and measurable outcomes, improving key performance indicators and user completion rates. They require clarity on constraints and signals to guide data-driven iteration, prefer small incremental releases, and aim to maintain simplicity and accountability while managing cross-functional alignment and budgets effectively.
personality: Kehinde demonstrates an analytical, systems-oriented collaboration style valuing velocity, reliability, and ownership. They communicate through concise narratives, lightweight documentation, and transparent trade-offs. They prioritize proactive identification of unknowns, experimental validation, readable processes, and humane workflows, fostering clear accountability and continuous improvement through structured rituals and mentorship.
